author: jmason
msg: Bayesian classification, using the Robinson system (which seems less FP/FN-prone than the Graham method).  Also added --bayes switch to mass-check, tweaked hit-frequencies ranking system, and disabled PhraseFreqs (since Bayes is much better).  Also split round_the_world-received test into a net and local test

author: zelgadis
msg: Bug #1133: Check for weird HELO lying

author: quinlan
msg: exempt address groups from most of the T_NO_LOWER tests

msg: T_BODY_8BITS used "body" where it should have used "describe".
